list.name: Aimie C: Teacher
list.about: I'm Aimie, an English teacher from the UK with over 5 years of teaching experience in the UK, Vietnam, and Thailand. I look forward to meeting you and accompanying you on your journey to improve your English!

reviews.name: Minh T.
reviews.content: Ms. Aimie teaches enthusiastically and clearly. Her British accent is perfect!

workshops.title: Basic Speaking for Beginners
workshops.description: Improve your basic speaking and listening skills in this workshop.

workshops.title: IELTS Writing Strategies
workshops.description: Focuses on structure and ideas for both Task 1 & 2.

list.name: My Quyen: Teacher
list.language: Fluent in Taiwanese and native Vietnamese
list.about: I'm My Quyen, a teacher from Taiwan with over 3 years of experience teaching both Vietnamese and international students. I focus on helping learners speak English naturally and confidently.

reviews.name: Thu N.
reviews.content: Very clear explanations, kind and dedicated!

items.title: Qualified & Trusted Teachers
items.desc: Experienced, certified native teachers who inspire you and help you improve every lesson.

items.title: Fun & Effective Learning
items.desc: From daily conversation to test prep, engaging and goal-oriented lessons.

items.title: Flexible Schedule for Busy People
items.desc: Students or working professionals can learn anytime that fits their schedule.

items.title: 1-on-1 Learning Your Way
items.desc: Join a free trial to find the best-fit teacher for your needs.

items.name: Phuong Nghi
items.content: The website is easy to use, fast loading, and the UI is sleek. Online learning is super convenient without leaving home. The program is personalized to my level, no pressure or stress. I love the flexible schedule, perfect for busy students like me.

items.name: Nhi Nguyen
items.content: The British teacher speaks very clearly and corrects my mistakes carefully, always focusing on quality rather than quantity. Miss Aimie is friendly, patient, and explains everything well. I'm now much more confident speaking English.

items.name: My My
items.content: At first, I was worried about speaking English. But thanks to the practical lessons and dedicated teachers, I’ve improved a lot. Topics are diverse and applicable. My pronunciation was corrected in detail, and I now feel more comfortable speaking every day.

cta.title: Start your language learning journey today!
cta.desc: Get free consultation from our team of professional learning advisors.
